Name: Raspberry Sake'tini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Fruity with wafts of sake - reminiscent of a French Martini.
History: A riff on a French Martini .
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Sake'tini contains 211 calories
